unnormalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVAL! The entertainment scene is buzzing, folks! Film festivals are popping up faster than you can say "cut!" Seems like every other week there's a new one.
normalised: Lights, Camera, FESTIVAL! The entertainment scene is buzzing, folks! Film festivals are popping up faster than you can say "cut!" Seems like every other week there's a new one.

unnormalised: Just wrapped up the 7th Annual Chennai International Short Film Festival, and boy, was it a treat! Saw some amazing independent work. Next up? All eyes are on the Kolkata Film Festival in November – heard they're expecting a record number of submissions this year.
normalised: Just wrapped up the seventh Annual Chennai International Short Film Festival, and boy, was it a treat! Saw some amazing independent work. Next up? All eyes are on the Kolkata Film Festival in November – heard they're expecting a record number of submissions this year.

unnormalised: Seriously, if you're a film buff, now's the time to travel! You can catch some hidden gems *before* they blow up on Netflix. Plus, many festivals offer incredible networking opportunities for aspiring filmmakers.
normalised: Seriously, if you're a film buff, now's the time to travel! You can catch some hidden gems before they blow up on Netflix. Plus, many festivals offer incredible networking opportunities for aspiring filmmakers.

unnormalised: And let's be honest, the after-parties are legendary. Free-flowing chai, spicy biryani under the stars… what's not to love? Word on the street is the Bangalore Film Festival this winter will even have an Onam Sadhya spread one evening! Run, don't walk! Gotta catch 'em all! See you at the movies!
normalised: And let's be honest, the after-parties are legendary. Free-flowing chai, spicy biryani under the stars… what's not to love? Word on the street is the Bangalore Film Festival this winter will even have an Onam Sadhya spread one evening! Run, don't walk! Gotta catch 'em all! See you at the movies!
